changeSet.sql: WITH series AS (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 1000) sery), count_series AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS quantity FROM series), random_date as (select (NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 700) + 700)) * INTERVAL '1 day')) INSERT INTO trainings (start_date_at_utc, end_date_at_utc, inserted_date_at_utc, updated_date_at_utc, device_id, training_type_id) SELECT rd::text::timestamp without time zone at time zone 'Etc/UTC', rd::text::timestamp without time zone at time zone 'Etc/UTC' + interval '2 hour', rd::text::timestamp without time zone at time zone 'Etc/UTC' + interval '3 hour', rd::text::timestamp without time zone at time zone 'Etc/UTC' + interval '10 day', FLOOR(RANDOM() * (cs.quantity - 1) + 1), FLOOR(RANDOM() * (cs.quantity - 1) + 1) FROM series s, count_series cs, random_date rd
